sections.heading: receipts and expenditures; publication
sections.text: The mayor and city council of a city of the first class shall cause to be published semiannually a statement of the receipts of the city and an itemized account of the expenditures of the city.SourceLaws 1901, c. 18, ยง 93, p. 296;R.S.1913, ยง 4988;C.S.1922, ยง 41
